data.title: Mildred Bennett
data.meta_description: Mildred Bennett passed away. This is the full obituary where you can share condolences and memories. Published in the New Castle News on 2019-05-26.
data.text:
Mildred Joan Bennett, 74, of New Castle passed away on May 18, 2019.

Mildred (Millie) was born on March 3, 1945, in England, to the late Charles Slack and Emily Meeks.

She married Benjamin Bennett on April 4, 1964, who preceded her in death on Sept. 22, 2016.

Millie was a member of Calvary Independent Church.

Millie is survived by two daughters and a son-in-law, Joanie and David Restino of Clearfield and Pamla Mixter of Pittsburgh; two sons and daughter-in-law, Michael Bennett of New Castle, Warren and Genie Bennett of Cincinnati, Ohio; two brothers, David and Brian; four sisters, Laurie, Faye, Peggy, and Dorothy; and two grandchildren, David Restino, Jr. and Heather Mixter.

A Memorial service will be held at 2 p.m. Friday, May 31, 2019, at Calvary Independent Church, 424 E. Moody Ave. Rev. Charles Fombelle will officiate. Flowers may be sent directly to the church.

Published on May 26, 2019

Note: These are general guidelines; some florists may not be able to operate within these timelines. During peak periods such as Valentineâ€™s Day, Memorial Day and most holidays, florists are not always able to keep up to demand. Tribute will contact you if there are any issues.

Plant a tree: How does it work

When your purchase is complete, a post will be made on the tribute wall of the deceased signifying the planting of a memorial tree.

An official certificate recognizing your purchase will be included with your email receipt. You can then forward the email to the family or print it and give it to them personally.

After an order is placed, our forestry partners will plant the tree in the area of greatest need (nearest the funeral home), according to the planting schedule for the year.

Due to seasonal conditions, the tree planting takes place during the spring and summer.

Tree Planting Timeline

Orders placed in:

January - May

Planting will take place in Spring or Summer of the same year.

June - December

Planting will take place in Spring of the following year.
